segments.text: Can I have a look at your international timetable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry.We don't have a printed one . Is there anything else I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Do you have any direct flight to Tokyo ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , we don't . I don't think you can find any airline which offers a non-stop flight to Tokyo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about a flight to Paris ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It is really a place of interest and we have the direct flight everyday .
segments.speaker: S2
